attributes.action: To create a ‘patient led mobility forum’ that leads on the provision of equipment and services for prosthetics, orthotics, wheelchairs, electronic assistive technologies and foot care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Please remove the contact details and urls. You can reword and resubmit if you wish.
reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
